tweets.text: @DrMickSalt @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids It would be interesting for the @EnvAgency and @PHE_EoEngland to give us more interpretation of the figures as they come out so we have an understanding of what they explicitly mean. PM inc 2.5 and methane have had the same spikes as H2S yet we hear more about H2S #stopthestink

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency The MMFs are monitoring PM1, PM2.5, PM4 & PM10. However, according to my tamed, anonymous PM expert, they believe that only PM2.5 and PM10 are being measured explicitly, with an interpolation algorithm used to generate the other two. @EnvAgencyMids, please could you comment?

@DrMickSalt @LoneRanger77777 Sounds like it‚Äôs actions generated by the operator rather than the @EnvAgency ? Still no willingness to engage with the community though @RedIndustries2 as you‚Äôve shared nothing with us about them despite your letter promising otherwise #redindustries #stopthestink
STINKS! @EnvAgency @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @RedIndustries2 #redindustries #stopthestink @BorisJohnson @MattHancock https://t.co/YaADAW7kFx

urls.description: Today's blog marks the start of bathing water season.

tweets.text:
Many of us are planning a holiday closer to home this year üåä

Throughout the bathing water season we test the water at over 400 locations. You can check online how clean it is before you go to the beach.

urls.title: | Environment Agency Board Member
urls.description: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs Environment, Food & Rural Affairs D irector of Floods and Water, Defra ‚Ä¢ Departmental Official Chair, Environment Agency ‚Ä¢ Representative of Organisation Chair, Highways England ‚Ä¢ Independent Member ‚Ä¢ sets the strategy, drives performance and holds the organisation to account; ‚Ä¢ provides stewardship for public funds and environmental outcomes. The Board is made up of a Chair, Chief Executive and up to 14 other members. The Board has a collegiate style. It

tweets.text:
We‚Äôre looking for new leaders in flood and coastal erosion risk management and in land management to join the @EnvAgency Board. 

More info here: https://t.co/DQoV8pGX7W 

Applications close 2 June https://t.co/VikNjffiPV

Many thanks to the teams at @rnli_teddington  @ChiswickRNLI and @EnvAgency; our colleagues at @BDMLR @LondonPortAuth and @ZSLWhipsnadeZoo  and special thanks to the team at @_LNSLTD for fantastic help and support last week. Great group effort in difficult circumstances... https://t.co/nZqDC1Pi5A

We have reviewed the application to the @EnvAgency for tunnel approval. The document and the supporting reports are missing critical borehole logs and reports around the sensitive R Misbourne crossing locations at Chalfont St Giles and Shardeloes Lake. Why????

@DHSCgovuk @EnvAgency Coming to a river near you soon!  Yet another reason why sewage should be properly treated  (as we all pay for) rather than allowed to spill untreated into our rivers? You can't have it both ways @EnvAgency As custodians of the water environment you are absolutely woeful.

urls.title: Water firms are main source of microplastics in UK rivers, study says
urls.description: Research says discharge of untreated sewage and wastewater during dry spells to blame

tweets.text:
Important new research out today by @Jamie_Woodward_ & others identifies water firms as the main source of microplastics in UK rivers. 

Builds more pressure on government @EnvAgency to tackle the way water firms release untreated effluent into our rivers.
https://t.co/HKK1Ar0abP

Climate change and population growth put pressure on water supply.

We need to use water wisely to make sure we protect this vital resource for the future. 

Find out how you can save water: https://t.co/NxaKnH4gLE

@Waterwise #WaterSavingWeek
